tourBios.intlVics: (2): 2012 PGA of BC Championship [Can]. 2014 Pagoda Ridge Open [Can]. 2015 Vancouver Open [Can].
tourBios.carHigh:
Finished T15 in the season's second tournament, the Bayview Place Island Savings Open...Took the 36-hole lead at The Great Waterway Classic on the strength of a second-round 63, then shot rounds of 68-67, highlighted by a closing-hole eagle to pull away for the win, his first on Tour...Finished the season 12th on the Order of Merit to earn an exemption into the second stage of the Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament.

2014: Posted a T2 at the PC Financial Open, with rounds of 67-69-67-70, to finish one stroke behind champion Joel Dahmen...Played his way into a six-for-one-spot playoff at Qualifying School at Crown Isle, carding birdies on two of the playoff holes to lock up his spot on Tour with a T18. 2013: Missed cut at the Times Colonist Island Savings Open.
tourBios.personal: Lists "reeling in a big salmon" as his biggest thrill off the course...Enjoys fishing, snowboarding and hockey...Favorite course is Shaughnessy G&CC...Favorite professional team is the Vancouver Canucks

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was 1st in 2015 at the The Great Waterway Classic.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 40th in Scoring Average (Actual) on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
